entry.title: Julia for Python
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Simon Danisch

Track:PyData Julia is a new Language, that is fast, high level, dynamic and optimized for Data Science. But due to its young age, it might not be for everyone yet. Learn about Julia's strengths and how you can integrate it in your Python workflow!

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/ALEMND Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
